name: 萨缪尔·莫尔斯
bio_short: 美国画家和发明家。他从一位成功的画家转型为发明家，开创了“单线电报”系统（`morse_code_1837`），并发明了以他命名的“莫尔斯电码”。
bio_short_en: An American painter and inventor. He transitioned from a successful career as a painter to invent the 'single-wire telegraph' system (`morse_code_1837`) and the corresponding 'Morse Code' used to send messages.
